title: Slow cooker BBQ Beef Chilli
ingredients: ['500g steak mince', '1 (400g) tin tomato soup', '1 (400g) tin whole plum tomatoes', '2 tins of mixed beans in tomato sauce (bought from asda!)', '2 garlic cloves, thinly sliced', '2 teaspoons chilli powder', '1 teaspoon cayenne pepper', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '1 teaspoon cumin seeds', '1 tablespoon HP BBQ sauce', '1 teaspoon smoked paprika', 'Bisto powder to thicken', 'salt and pepper to taste']
